title: Ecommerce price comparision
description: This project is to compare product prices across multiple ECommerce sites, helping users find the best deals quickly and easily. It features real-time price updates and a user-friendly interface.

title: Agriculture and Aquaculture System
description: This project is to Empowering farmers with integrated solutions that combine modern machinery, organic fertilizers to maximize productivity and profitability.

title: Project Management System
description: This project is to Optimize project workflows and team collaboration with a comprehensive Project Management System for seamless planning and execution.
